sen.j: 五保制（ごほうせい・五保の制）は、 天智天皇が大化の改新の後、唐の律令制から導入したものの一つである。
sen.e: Goho-sei System is one of those introduced from the ritsuryo system of the Tang Dynasty by the Emperor Tenji after the Taika Reforms.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Goho-sei System is one of those introduced from the ritsuryo system of the Tang Dynasty by the Emperor Tenji after the Taika Reforms.
Goho-sei System is one of those introduced from the ritsuryo system of the Tang Dynasty by the Emperor Tenji after the Taika Reforms.

sen.j: 防犯・納税などの連帯義務を負わされた律令制下の末端行政組織である。
sen.e: It is the smallest unit of the administrative organization under the ritsuryo system which is collectively responsible for crime prevention and tax payment.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is the smallest unit of the administrative organization under the ritsuryo system which is collectively responsible for crime prevention and tax payment.
It is the smallest unit of the administrative organization under the ritsuryo system which is collectively responsible for crime prevention and tax payment.

sen.j: 5つの戸で保を編成し、保長を中心に相互監視にあたらせた。
sen.e: Ho is composed of five households and they engaged in mutual surveillance under the leader of ho.
Ho is composed of five households and they engaged in mutual surveillance under the leader of ho.
Ho is composed of five households and they engaged in mutual surveillance under the leader of ho.
